Earlier this year, Senator Bennet and I introduced the PFAS Action Plan of 2019 to address PFAS contamination and ensure Coloradans have access to safe drinking water. Learn more here: https://bit.ly/33QzCyF

The Administration must make clear to Beijing that any crackdown in Hong Kong will have profound consequences for China, including imposition of US sanctions, which was included in my amendment that passed the Senate as part of the National Defense Authorization Act.

The voice of the people of Hong Kong must be heard without fear of repression and retaliation. The Hong Kong government must fully guarantee the democratic rights of Hong Kongers, while Beijing must fully respect Hong Kong's autonomy. The world is watching. 📷: @Maxar pic.twitter.com/j0xY0efnSh

Based on information from law enforcement, the shooter in El Paso was motivated by xenophobia and this is a case of domestic terrorism. There’s no place for bigoted white supremacy in our nation.

Heartbreaking to see more senseless violence within 24 hours and we mourn the innocent lives lost. I’m grateful to Dayton law enforcement and all the first responders for their work to keep Americans safe.
Jaime and I are devastated by the tragic events today in El Paso. Our hearts go out to the victims, their loved ones and the entire community suffering because of this horrific act of violence.
